TopicTitle: Are we in a game...playing a game

Articles.Content:
I was playing KSP and started thinking...what if I am a Sims 1023.5 character that is being controlled by another person and this is a MMO...as my brain attempted to wrap around the notion I created a song to soothe my rampant imagination.

https://soundcloud.com/billy-winn-2/do-i-exist

But, as you listen think of this; do we exist? Yesterday is a memory that no longer exists, today is but a yesterday waiting to happen and tomorrow is a chaotic variable based on the fleeting now.

Luckily the song nixed my excessive thought processes on the matter, that is, until now...or are we a twisted version of Google maps...

*old lady stands up while Newton's speaking*

nope.avi

*Newton reaches his hand 7 feet over to her and pushes her back down into her seat*

Sorry for getting off-topic.

Do you think this belongs in Science Labs....?

Sorry if I seem like I'm backseat moderating again or something. (mods, spare me, please... )

Thanks for reading my post.

-Naten
